channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023120296
item.description:
Report X-2023120296

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-22T18:12:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-01
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: punctured with an object which caused a huge leakage on loadside. DescribePack: punctured by an object bout three inches wide. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: hazmat material were used to clean this spill.

item.title: Report X-2023120618
item.description:
Report X-2023120618

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS BEING LOADED INTO TRAILER WHEN PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED IT STARTED TO LEAK. THEY CALLED FOR HAZ TEAM. I SHOWED UP AND CLEANED. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS AT THE TOP. DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: CONTAINED THE RELEASE PLACING DRYING MATERIALS OVER IT AND DISCARDED MESS.
